author: spandeyehep
body:
The code updates between 80x and 90x brought up the energy scale by 3% in HB and 5% in HE (more details here: [link to HCAL presentation in JME meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/652583/contributions/2656096/attachments/1490577/2316750/HCAL_Updated_for_JME_20170710.pdf)

Which was fixed by HCAL team, by proposing new condition: HcalRespCorrs_2017plan1_v5.0_mc
Therefore, we had to re-calibrate PF hadrons according to this new condition. 

No major changes has been made in the code apart from changing few calibration parameters (for book-keeping and consistency).
Detailed summary of the development can be found here: [link](https://spandey.web.cern.ch/spandey/files/slides/930pre1_PFCalibration_21Jul2017.pdf)

This PR affects following package:
RecoParticleFlow/PFClusterTools/

Presentation is due in JERC meeting on 27 July and will be followed up in PPD/AlCa.
title: Offline PF hadron calibration for MC-v2
